xdi2.core.security.digest.validate

Interface DigestValidator<DIGEST extends Digest>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MDDigestValidator, SHADigestValidator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDigestValidator, AbstractMDDigestValidator, AbstractSHADigestValidator, MDBasicDigestValidator, SHABasicDigestValidator

    public interface DigestValidator<DIGEST extends Digest>
    A DigestValidator can validate an XDI Digest.
